title: Constantly "Attempting to Reconnect" in Games: Ruining EVERYTHING
body:
Hey guys, I have recently been having extreme problems with my connection in (and sometimes out of) games. Usually I'll make it into a game okay but within a couple minutes i will freeze up and get "Attempting to Reconnect". My internet is fine and still connected but the game will continually disconnect me and reconnect me. Some games are fine and I will play a whole game with one or MAYBE (if I'm lucky) one DC. However, usually I am dcing multiple times throughout the game. It causes me to stand still in lane and get rekt by my opponent or I will run back to base and be in the fountain when I reconnect. Some games I am literally attempting to reconnect longer than I actually get to play and I will end a game with a kd of 1-1-0 or 0-1-0 or something with VERY LITTLE ACTION. I really don't think the internet is this bad because everything else on the computer works without issues. I will even pres ctrl+alt+dlt when im reconnecting to check my internet and it says its fine and connected. What is the problem?! Please help me so I can actually play the game without issues like I used to. 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Even though your internet may seem fine, there can still be issues with your network specifically connecting to our server.  I suggest going through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your settings and connection is strong and able toe stablish a connection.  This should get you fixed and back in game!
Just ran everything through the HRT and played an ARAM without any Disconnections! :D thanks a bunch I hope this fixed it
Thanks a bunch for the quick response! Ill try that right away
